example_sentence_english: I have a lot of stuff.
The stuff is on the table.

notes: plural form; can also mean garments
example_sentence_italian: Robe del genere non mi piacciono.
example_sentence_english: I do not like things of that kind.

example_sentence_italian: Della roba non si butta niente.
example_sentence_english: You do not throw away any of the stuff.

example_sentence_italian: Passiamo alla roba dopo il pranzo.
example_sentence_english: Let's move on to the stuff after lunch.

example_sentence_italian: Non ho capito nulla dalla roba scritta.
example_sentence_english: I understood nothing from the written stuff.

example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato il biglietto nella roba.
example_sentence_english: I found the ticket in the stuff.
The cup is on the stuff.
Let's move on to practical things.

example_sentence_italian: Non ricordo niente dalle robe scritte.
example_sentence_english: I do not remember anything from the written things.
I looked in the old things.
There are stains on the things.

example_sentence_italian: Lavoro con le robe del laboratorio.
example_sentence_english: I work with the things from the laboratory.
